DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: Martínez Torres, D.;Martínez-Torres, David;Martínez Torres, David;Torres, David Martnez;MARTI´NEZ TORRES, DAVID;TORRES, DAVID MARTÍNEZ

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduação em Matemática pela Universidad Complutense de Madrid (1996), mestrado em Matemática pela University of California at Berkekey (1998) e doutorado em Matemática pela Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (2003).Professor do Departamento de Matemática da PUC-Rio desde janeiro 2014. Tem experiência na área de Matemática, com ênfase em Geometria e Topologia.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: bachelor's at Matemática from Universidad Complutense de Madrid (1996), master's at Matemática from University of California at Berkekey (1998) and doctorate at Matemática from Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (2003). He is currently visiting professor at Mathematical Institute, Utrecht University. Has experience in Mathematics, focusing on Mathematics, acting on the following subjects: geometry and topology, approximately holomorphic geometry, contact geometry, symplectic geometry and symplectic topology.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
(I). Pesquisador visitante (2 semanas ou mais): Universite Paris VI (2001), Instituto Superior Técnico, Lisboa (2002), IMPA (2008), Centre de Recerca Matematica, Barcelona (2008,2013), Universidad de la Laguna, Tenerife (2010), UPC, Barcelona (2011,2016,2017), Chuo University, Tokyo (2013,2015), University of Illinois,, Urbana-Champaigne (2014,2016), Utrecht University (2015,2016,2017). 
 
(II). Organizador do Seminário Simplético Conjunto no Rio (PUC-IMPA-UFF-UFRJ) 2014-2016, 2019-presente

(III). Preprints recentes:
 1- Nontrivial bundles of coadjoint orbits over $S^2$, Martínez Torres, D., Mundet i Riera, I. Preprint arXiv:1709.05247.
 2- An atlas adapted to the Toda flow. (with C. Tomei). Preprint arXiv:1909.02676.
 3- Canonical domains for coadjoint orbits. Preprint arXiv:2001.02623.
